recipesJson.name: Bam Bam Bites
recipesJson.author: XxBulldogIrishxX
recipesJson.description: Those Gooey Marshmallow-y Pebble crispy treats...I also have tried it with TPA Rice Crunchies @1% which was just as good but I felt like it didn't really need it to get the flavor I was going for. I feel like fruity flakes already does that by itself..all and all it's tasty but isn't fruity flakes always (For those who indulge)

reviews.text: This one is pretty good, some friends rated it high and it was true to the description.  I've found I enjoy FW Fruity Flakes at  a lower percentage, but not a bad recipe.  Couldn't give the full 5 stars just because I know what the BullDog is capable of.
